description: This file defines a Model class for managing todo items, including methods for creating, reading, updating, deleting, and counting todos, and exports it to the global window object.

classes.name: Model
classes.description: A class for managing todo items with methods for CRUD operations and counting.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with a given title and saves it using the storage.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Retrieves todo items based on query: all, by ID, or matching an object.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo item identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a todo item by ID.

methods.name: removeAll
methods.description: Removes all todo items from storage.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Counts active, completed, and total todos and passes the result to callback.
